net.chwthewke.hamcrest.equivalence
Class ArrayEquivalences

java.lang.Object
  net.chwthewke.hamcrest.equivalence.ArrayEquivalences

public final class ArrayEquivalences
extends Object

ArrayEquivalences allows to adapt an equivalence on a given type into an equivalence that acts upon arrays of that type. Additional overloads for arrays of primitive types are provided.

Method Detail

arrayEquivalence

public static <T> Equivalence<T[]> arrayEquivalence(Equivalence<? super T> equivalence,
                                                    boolean inOrder)
Adapts an equivalence on T into an equivalence on T[]. Two arrays will be equivalent by the returned equivalence iff there exists a 1-to-1 mapping between their respective elements such that each pair of elements in the mapping are equivalent according to the provided equivalence.

Type Parameters:
T - The component type.
Parameters:
equivalence - An equivalence on T.
inOrder - When true, imposes the additional restriction that the above-mentioned mapping must respect array order.
Returns:
The adapted equivalence on T[].
